body:
I managed to resolve this issue.

Pay particular attention to the client app setup in this document, i.e. here: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/security/blazor/webassembly/hosted-with-azure-active-directory?view=aspnetcore-3.1#client-app-configuration

This section:

As it says here, ensure you use your api client id for the DefaultAccessTokenScopes.

So in our case, i changed from:

'https://app.com/d8302c4f-7ef1-49ac-92a0-a9c46b875313/App.Writers'

to

'd8302c4f-7ef1-49ac-92a0-a9c46b875313/App.Writers'
